name: Email Templates & Code 💌
description:
Responsive email templates and HTML code using auto layout and the Marka plugin, designed for you 💌


Subscribe to my newsletter which uses the designs in this file ❤️


I wanted to improve my writing and decided to start a newsletter to share my monthly design snippets, instead of using existing templates i thought it would be great to design my own newsletter.


This file works with the Marka plugin to generate HTML code so you can have amazing customisable emails.

All credit goes to Grigoriy Mashkovtsev


The file has designs for

  • Newsletters,
  • Marketing emails
  • Blog style template


The illustrations featured in this file:

  • 3D Present
  • Mail Icon
  • Images Unsplash
